label: ForecastTerms
comment: A set of terms and conditions by which a supply chain forecast has been or will be made.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of date in these supply chain forecast terms.
The code specifying the forecast type in these supply chain forecast terms.
A code specifying a commitment level in these supply chain forecast terms.
A code specifying a frequency in these supply chain forecast terms.

referencedBy.comment: The supply chain forecast terms applicable to this header trade agreement.
The supply chain forecast terms applicable to this header trade agreement.
